document.title: Technical Bulletins: FLSA Amendments Being Enforced for All Municipal Employees
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin clarifies aspects of the Fair Labor Standards Act, making Tennessee cities aware that the Wage and Hour Division, Department of Labor, includes all city employees except fire and police personnel in audits of hours worked and wages paid.
